short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the time saved when the playback speed of a YouTube video is adjusted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just change the speed and the amount of time you save will be displayed below the video. It's simple and blends in with YouTube's look and feel.
